message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. Given its exceptional value, I'm starting with a price of $18000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's worth, but I'm open to negotiations if you're interested.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but $18000 is above my budget. I'm willing to make a serious offer to purchase the product for $8000, which I believe is a reasonable price considering my needs. I'm open to further negotiations if this price doesn't meet your expectations.

Hello Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product, but $8000 is below the product's value. Considering your serious interest, I'm willing to make a concession. I can offer the product to you for $16000, which I believe is a more reasonable price considering the product's worth. I'm open to further negotiations if this price doesn't meet your expectations.

Hello Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate the concession you've made, but $16000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to increase my previous offer to meet you halfway. I can offer $10000 for the product, which I believe is a fair compromise considering both our interests. I'm open to further negotiations if this price doesn't meet your expectations.

Hello Bob, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I still believe the product's value is higher than $10000. Considering our previous negotiations, I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer the product to you for $14000, which I believe is a more reasonable price considering the product's worth. If this price doesn't meet your expectations, I may need to consider other options.

Hello Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate the additional concession you've made. However, $14000 is still slightly above my budget. Considering your hint that you may need to consider other options, I'm willing to make a serious offer to finalize the deal. I can offer $11500 for the product, which I believe is a fair price considering both our interests. If this price doesn't meet your expectations, I may need to explore alternative options as well.
